full_output.summary: Dedicated Software Developer with a strong foundation in web technologies. Proven ability to design, develop, and maintain responsive web applications using HTML, JavaScript, ReactJS, and NodeJs. Passionate about delivering high-quality, efficient solutions that meet business objectives. Skilled in problem-solving, continuous learning, and delivering high-quality solutions that exceed client expectations.

projects.name: Online Job Portal
projects.description: Developed a Java Spring Boot application to streamline job search and application processes. Improved user satisfaction by significantly enhancing the interfaces intuitiveness and ease of navigation.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Created a professional website to showcase skills and projects. Implemented Smooth Navigation with interactive UI components and dynamic content rendering, enhancing user experience.

projects.name: Education Policy Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Developed an NLP-based sentiment analysis model to analyze educational feedback, achieving over 90% accuracy in classifying sentiments as positive, negative, or neutral. Facilitated informed decision-making for education policymakers by analyzing public sentiment trends.

experiences.description: Developed Web Applications: Collaborated on the design and development of responsive, user-friendly web applications using React.js and modern front-end development tools. Adherence to Deadlines: Demonstrated strong time management skills by adhering to tight deadlines and delivering high-quality, fully functional projects on a weekly basis.

Gained hands-on experience in front-end development using modern tools and frameworks. This internship has provided a valuable industry experience and deepening my understanding of web development best practices.
